is_bool: This function returns whether a given variable is a boolean (<tt>true</tt> ior <tt>false</tt>) or not. In some cases you want to check and see if a variable in GameMaker Studio 2 holds a boolean value, and that's when you would use this function.
The above code checks the variable "val" to see if it is a real number and if it is it then uses it to set a global variable.
